name: Pool.Gadgetry
display_help: Gadgetry gives you access to highly advanced technology to weaken or blast your foes. This power pool gives you access to a jetpack as your travel power. While your jetpack is active you gain access to a Turbo Charge power which allows you to fly even faster for a short time.
set_buy_requires: !(((((((((((Pool.Sorcery.Spirit_Ward || Pool.Sorcery.Arcane_Bolt) || Pool.Sorcery.Mystic_Flight) || Pool.Experimentation.Experimental_Injection) || Pool.Experimentation.Toxic_Dart) || Pool.Experimentation.Speed_of_Sound) || Pool.Force_of_Will.Weaken_Resolve) || Pool.Force_of_Will.Project_Will) || Pool.Force_of_Will.Mighty_Leap) || Pool.Utility_Belt.Bolas) || Pool.Utility_Belt.Poisoned_Dagger) || Pool.Utility_Belt.Freerunning)
display_set_buy_requires_failed: You can only have one Specialized power pool in your build.

powers.name: Pool.Gadgetry.Turbo_Boost
powers.display_help: Activating this power will give you a massive burst to your flight speed for a short time. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Pool.Gadgetry.Nano_Net

powers.name: Pool.Gadgetry.Wrist_Blaster
powers.display_help: You fire a series of blasts from a sophisticated energy drone. Wrist Blaster deals Moderate energy damage and will reduce the target's regeneration rate for a short time. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5.00% chance for 32.25 energy damage on target
20.00% chance for 38.70 energy damage on target

powers.name: Pool.Gadgetry.Jetpack
powers.display_help: By activating this power will you will be able to fly at high speeds. While this power is active you will have the ability to engage a Turbo Boost for a short time to further speed up your flight.

powers.name: Pool.Gadgetry.Blaster_Barrage
powers.display_help: You fire off a barrage of energy blasts from an advanced energy drone dealing Moderate energy damage to foes in long cone in front of you. Drone Barrage requires you to have two other powers from the Gadgetry power pool. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone  60 ft. radius 50 arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Pool.Gadgetry.Force_Barrier
powers.display_help: You activate a force field around you for a short time that will absorb a high amount of damage before dissipating. Force Barrier requires you to have two other powers from the Gadgetry power pool. Recharge: Long
